official_title: To designate the United States courthouse under construction at 333 Las Vegas Boulevard South in Las Vegas, Nevada, as the "Lloyd D. George United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. courthouse under construction at 333 Las Vegas Boulevard South, in Las Vegas, Nevada, as the Lloyd D. George United States Courthouse.

titles.title: To designate the United States courthouse under construction at 333 Las Vegas Boulevard South in Las Vegas, Nevada, as the "Lloyd D. George United States Courthouse".
